## goal account new

Create a new Algorand account

### Synopsis

Create a new Algorand account

```
goal account new [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --default   Set this account as the default one
  -h, --help      help for new
  -o, --online    Set this account to online or offline when created (defaults to online=true) (default true)
```
